name: UNiagaraDataInterfaceCurveBase
doc: Base class for curve data interfaces which facilitates handling the curve data in a standardized way.

OptimizeThreshold: Threshold used to optimize the LUT.
ExposedName: Sets a custom name for the binding to make it easier to identify.
bExposeCurve: Generates a texture for the curve which can be exposed to material bindings.
bOptimizeLUT: Do we optimize the LUT, this saves memory but may introduce errors.  Errors can be reduced modifying the threshold.
